mutants.code:
import re

def regex_match(pattern, string):
    match = re.match(pattern, string)
    return match.group(1) if match else None

mutants.code:
import re

def regex_match(pattern, string):
    match = re.match(pattern, string)
    return match.group(1) if match else None
